0.text: Librarian: We've got a new encyclopaedia. It was donated by UNESCO* recently. You'll find it in the reference section.
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Librarian: We've got a new encyclopaedia. It was donated by UNESCO recently. You'll find it in the reference section.</prosody></speak>

1.text: Hasini: Aren't there any new books?
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ɾaːsini'>Hasini</phoneme>: Aren't there any new books?</prosody></speak>

2.text: Librarian : We have a good one called "Children of the World." Let me check…. No, we haven't got it at the moment. Someone has borrowed it.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Librarian : We have a good one called "Children of the World." Let me check…. No, we haven't got it at the moment. Someone has borrowed it.</prosody></speak>

3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ɾaːsini'>Hasini</phoneme>: Can I reserve it?</prosody></speak>

4.text: Librarian: Of course. Then we can hold it for you.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Librarian: Of course. Then we can hold it for you.</prosody></speak>

7.text: Read the dialogue and complete the sentences.
